intro.title: Welcome to MarkFlowy!
intro.ai_desc: Built-in translation, summary, and DeepSeek/ChatGPT and other mainstream models support.
intro.modes_desc: Switch between WYSIWYG and Source Code.
intro.files_desc: Handles Markdown, JSON, TXT, and more.
intro.themes_desc: Design and share your own editor styles.
intro.images_desc: Easy path management or Base64 conversion.
intro.manager_desc: Powerful tree view with global search.

config.description: Next-generation professional text editor designed for AI.

hero.title: MarkFlowy
hero.subtitle:
MarkFlowy is committed to efficient and comfortable Markdown creation,
The next generation professional editor driven by AI.

feature1.title: Multiple Editing Modes
feature1.description: Supports source code and WYSIWYG editing modes to meet different scenario needs, and supports editing files other than Markdown, such as json, txt, etc.

feature2.title: Built-in AI Assistant
feature2.description: Integrates a powerful AI assistant that supports text generation, conversation, translation, and other functions to improve editing efficiency.

feature3.title: Custom Themes
feature3.description: Provides built-in light and dark themes, and supports custom themes to meet personalized needs.

contributors.title: Built by Many Contributors
contributors.description: Thanks to all the developers who have contributed to MarkFlowy
